oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Domino Enyne/IMDA Approach to the Core Structure of (-) Vinigrol
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BETKEKAR, VV
SAYYAD, AA
KALIAPPAN, KP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: CLOSING METATHESIS APPROACH
TRICYCLIC RING-SYSTEM
VIRGARIA-NIGRA
CONSTRUCTION
SKELETON
CYCLIZATION
REARRANGEMENT
FRAMEWORK
STRATEGY
CASCADE
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report here an enantioselective formal synthesis of vinigrol involving a 1-2-3 strategy: one pot and two reactions with the formation of three rings leading to the core structure of vinigrol from its stereochemically well-defined acyclic precursor.
